response.overview: The return of Tina and her husband, Kamal, to the village during Ramadan brought dissatisfaction to her mother-in-law, Kiah, as Tina's sales were better than hers. Tina was unhappy with the refrigerator at Kiah's house. She said the refrigerator was old and not strong enough to hold all her pastries and cakes for sale. Hurt by Tina's statement, Kiah cursed Tina to become a refrigerator. Can Tina escape from her mother-in-law's curse?
response.title: Sumpahan Peti Ais
